name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 74,311 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to send an orb of volatile black blood drifting to your target, exploding for 218,294 Shadow damage split between all nearby enemies on impact. Intercepting the orb allows you to siphon its power, instead increasing your Mastery by 3,954 for 15 sec.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
